channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: SOC can see Microsoft analysis for Third-party add-in user report
item.description:
We are pleased to announce that if you are using third-party report message solutions in Microsoft Outlook, such as Knowbe4, Hoxhunt, and Cofense, you can now configure Defender for Office 365 to automatically forward these suspicious messages to Microsoft for analysis. To enable this setting, you must do the following:
Go to User reported settings in the Microsoft Defender portal, select Monitor reported messages in Outlook, and then select Use a non-Microsoft add-in button. In the Reported message destination section, select Microsoft and my reporting mailbox, and then provide the email add...
